name: Fragmented Love
description:
Fragmented Love Is a short Visual Novel about a Young Man who lost his memory

Story

A young man wakes up from a coma that lasted a week after an incident that leaves  him forgetting all of his loved one. Now he tries his best to piece together all of his forgotten memories. Including his loving husband. Who Is somehow missing.

This game was meant to be released MONTHS ago. But due to personal events it never happened! The story is a bit old and I was planning on redoing it but I decided that before I did I let you guys see what it would've looked like!

The game should take about 15-20 minutes to complete! It's not a very long Beta lol.

If you guys enjoy playing this game please let me know! It may encourage me to make more content like this!

Credits

All Art & Story by Sheba Arts

Music Composed by Tom Spark and Zane "Xag" Aguilar

DISCLAIMER

This game Is a Beta and therefore may have bugs, glitches, and other errors! If you ever encounter any. Please let me know!
